segments.text: Hello , Tom . How do you find the dinner of yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . That may be the most delicious food I have ever eaten .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nice of you to say so .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really appreciate you for having invited me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . You know , we ’ re old friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , I owe you one . Are you free tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to invite you to enjoy the food I cook .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great . I'd love to .
segments.speaker: S1
